name: 李尚軒
objective:
一、本課程目標在於提升學生對於國文賞析之興趣，以及培養實際應用國文之基本能力，進而提升人文素養、道德情操，使學生皆能於國文知識與應用兩者兼備，並熟悉人文思維之邏輯思辨方法與程序。 

二、本課程選文以經史子集、台灣文學、應用文體為主，並結合規劃將文學與當學期節日、時事等結合，希望學生能在跟隨古聖賢哲人的心路歷程中，也能學以致用，在現今日常生活中，體驗文學的藝術美感及嘗試創作。

1. The goal of this course is to enhance students' interest in the appreciation and analysis of Chinese language, and to develop the basic ability to practically apply Chinese language, thereby enhancing humanistic literacy and moral sentiment.To enable students to have both knowledge and application of Chinese language, and be familiar with the logical thinking methods and procedures of humanistic thinking.

2. The selected essays of this course are mainly based on the sub-collection of classics and history, Taiwanese literature, and applied styles, and combined with planning to combine literature with current semester festivals and current events. 
 hope students can followFollowing the mentality of ancient sages and sages, they can also apply what they have learned, and experience the artistic beauty of literature and try to create in daily life.
